Posts.Content: Glucosamine and MSM help with joint pain, my experiences with B-12, methylcobalamin type helps with neuropathy, wish I knew one for nausea since I am nauseous all the time.  I hear  curcumin and tumeric work well for people on this site as alternate cancer treatments.  I wish I knew more, but if I hear or any, I will write back.
Posts.Title: Aramosin side effects help

Posts.Content: At the age of 17 you would have some dull aching in your breasts, because you are growing.  The milky discharge may be nothing because you are growing, so don't freak out.  Talk to your mom and see if she thinks you should go to the doctor.   I know if it were me, I would tell my mom and I  would like it if my daughter told me too.  If it is something, which it probably isn't, time is of the essence.  Talk to your mom.
Posts.Title: Seventeen and experiencing nipple discharge?

Posts.Content: Hi Kaliee,  If you are concerned, you should get a second opinion.  That would be the berst hing, so you will feel at ease..  It is not abnormal to have dense breasts and especially if you are nursing.  Don't panic, but get another opinion to make yourself feel better
Posts.Title: I am 20 found lump, nipple is inverting and need advice!

Posts.Content: sorry for the spelling error, it's late, and i'm tired!  Go to another doctor sweetie
Posts.Title: I am 20 found lump, nipple is inverting and need advice!

Posts.Content: I don't have breast cancer, but if you would like to chat, I would be more than willing to let you bounce ideas off me. I know that what you are thinking of doing is a huge decision, and it would be nice to just chat with someone else.  Let me know Emily
